rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious reception area with indigenous Bohemian decor; includes a small sitting area and display of local artifacts

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space that flows into the kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, integrated Bohemian decor elements such as vintage furniture, eclectic art pieces and vibrant textiles

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen with traditional touches like exposed brick finishes and rustic wooden counters; designed to complement the living area and facilitate easy access to dining space

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden; designed with Bohemian-inspired decor featuring natural fabrics and handcrafted furniture

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy guest room incorporating local art motifs and comfortable seating arrangements

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Functional bedroom designed with built-in storage, vibrant Bohemian textiles, and natural lighting through a balcony window

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom that can serve as an office or guest room, featuring a dual-purpose design with modular furniture to meet the needs of a modern family

rooms.name: Bathroom Suite
rooms.description: Comprehensive bathroom suite integrated with the bedrooms on this floor; designed with traditional Indian finishes and water-efficient fixtures
